channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NV

item.title: Report X-2023070126
item.description:
Report X-2023070126

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-28T15:11:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-27
  • City: LAS VEGAS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat was brought to QA station for inspection because it was wet. DescribePack: hazmat has a loosed cap causing it to spill DurationRel: 8 and MitigateEffect: hazmat was place in a hazmat tote and brought to QA.
